name: This is a sample event on how to fill up this file. For whitelistEvents.json: all fields are required. For blacklistEvents.json: id, formatted_time and url are required. Time fields are filled in as an example for time format DD MMM YYYY, ddd, h:mm a.
SG Geek Girls Maker Series: Revival of Mechanical Arts in the Maker movement
description: Welcome to the first Singapore Geek Girls event of 2015! The Maker series highlights women in the technology who are passionate about building and sharing their work. We kick off the year by inviting Denisa Kera, Associate Prof at NUS, who is an integral part of the Maker Movement in Asia to talk about her personal journey through various DIY, maker and hacker communities around the world, which transformed her from a philosopher to designer. Join her in the first SG Geek Girls Makers Series to discuss projects in open science, traditional crafts and art.

name: FOSSASIA
description: The Smart City with Open Source, Big Data, Design Thinking and Free Knowledge Tools at Asia's Premier Open Technology Event

name: March Dribbble Meetup
description: Sessions Xiaodan is sharing a case study of millennium hotel where the design was well received by the clients and users. The talk will cover rapid design, prototyping and research example. James is sharing a short talk on content-driven– and continuous design. Or, How I Learned to Love Uncertainty & Stop Designing Everything Upfront. Some case studies from the trenches.
location: ThoughtWorks Pte. Ltd. 87B Amoy Street, Level 3 Singapore 069906
